statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM social_media_influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name FROM social_media_influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM social_media_influencers WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count FROM social_media_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_influencers WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'M%' OR influencer_name LIKE 'S%' OR influencer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM social_media_influencers WHERE influencer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM Influential_Users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM Influential_Users WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Influential_Users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Brand_Promotions WHERE promotion_type = 'Sponsored Post' ORDER BY promotion_date DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count, social_media_platform FROM Influential_Users WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT user_id, username, social_media_platform, followers_count FROM Influential_Users ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT user_id, username, social_media_platform, followers_count FROM Influential_Users WHERE social_media_platform='Instagram'
SELECT * FROM Brand_Promotions WHERE promotion_type='Sponsored Post' AND promotion_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, social_media_platform, followers_count, promotion_type FROM Influential_Users LEFT JOIN Brand_Promotions ON Influential_Users.user_id = Brand_Promotions.user_id

SELECT user_id, username, social_media_platform, COUNT(promotion_id) AS num_promotions FROM Influential_Users LEFT JOIN Brand_Promotions ON Influential_Users.user_id = Brand_Promotions.user_id GROUP BY user_id, username, social_media_platform ORDER BY num_promotions DESC
SELECT * FROM influential_users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM influential_users WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT username, engagement_score FROM influential_users ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, brand_id, promotion_type FROM brand_promoters WHERE promotion_type = 'sponsored';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_agents WHERE expertise_area = 'Technical Support';
SELECT * FROM influential_users WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM influential_users WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, b.promotion_type FROM influential_users u JOIN brand_promoters b ON u.user_id = b.user_id;
SELECT a.agent_id, u.username, a.expertise_area FROM customer_support_agents a JOIN influential_users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(b.brand_id) AS promotion_count FROM influential_users u LEFT JOIN brand_promoters b ON u.user_id = b.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(b.brand_id) > 1 ORDER BY promotion_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, social_media_platform FROM influencers ORDER BY social_media_platform ASC;
SELECT brand_name, industry, reputation_score FROM brands WHERE reputation_score >= 4.5 ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id FROM brand_influencers;
SELECT * FROM influencers
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_platform FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000
SELECT * FROM brands ORDER BY reputation_score DESC
SELECT brand_name, website_url FROM brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion' AND reputation_score > 4.0
SELECT b.brand_name, i.influencer_name FROM brands b JOIN brand_influencers bi ON b.brand_id = bi.brand_id JOIN influencers i ON bi.influencer_id = i.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM InfluentialUsers;
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM InfluentialUsers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry='Fashion';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, reputation_score FROM InfluentialUsers WHERE reputation_score > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM InfluentialUsers;
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM InfluentialUsers ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;

SELECT user_name, brand_name, industry FROM InfluentialUsers LEFT JOIN BrandPromotions ON InfluentialUsers.user_id = BrandPromotions.user_id LEFT JOIN Brands ON BrandPromotions.brand_id = Brands.brand_id;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM InfluentialUsers LEFT JOIN SocialMediaPosts ON InfluentialUsers.user_id = SocialMediaPosts.user_id GROUP BY user_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC;

SELECT brand_name, promotion_type, COUNT(*) AS total_promotions FROM Brands LEFT JOIN BrandPromotions ON Brands.brand_id = BrandPromotions.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name, promotion_type ORDER BY total_promotions DESC;
